EmailTemplate.name: Tier3_Non_Target_Cold_Nurture.Tier3_Non_Target_Cold_Nurture_Email2
EmailTemplate.subject: Automate your workloads not your workers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Turbonomic <[[https://www.turbonomic.com]]> delivers workload automation for hybrid clouds, simultaneously optimizing performance, cost, and compliance in real time.
IT teams who automate with Turbonomic:
- Increase infrastructure utilization <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization]]> - Lower cloud costs <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend]]> - Improve IT staff productivity <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/improve-it-staff-productivity]]> - Accelerate cloud migrations projects <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]> - Accelerate data center transformation projects <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-consolidation-refresh-projects]]>
Our mission is to deliver a software platform that continuously and automatically maintains the health of workloads, at scale, wherever they are deployed.
Let us know if you would like to learn more <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
